class gstTriPolyMeshBase : public gstSpatialObject

Base class for triangular polygons class.

From header file: gstTriPolyMeshBase.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstTriPolyMeshBase
gstTriPolyMeshBaseThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructors are protected so that instances can not be created.
gstTriPolyMeshBaseCopy constructor.
Functions
getCreaseAngle Return the angle tolerance between faces.
getOwner Returns the owner object of derived type gstModifyBase that uses or owns this object.
getVertexOrder Set vertex order triangle polygons are specified by to determine their surface normal.
modify Signifies that modifiedTriPoly has been modified.
setCreaseAngle Set the angle tolerance between faces.
setOwner Specifies an object of derived type gstModifyBase that uses or owns this object.
setVertexOrder Set vertex order triangle polygons are specified in to determine their surface normal.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
Virtual Functions
beginModifySignifies that this object may be modified after this call.
endModificationsSignifies that modifications to this object and any gstTriPoly objects making up the triangular mesh have ceased.
endModifySignifies that modifications to the argument spatial object have ceased.
getTypeIdVirtual form of getClassTypeId.
isOfTypeVirtual form of staticIsOfType.
Enums
VertexOrder_Enumeration used to specify clockwise or counterclockwise specification of polygon normal based on vertices.
